memorandums.title: DIRECTIVE ON FACIAL COVERINGS FOR ENHANCED PUBLIC SAFETY AND IDENTIFICATION IN PUBLIC AND GOVERNMENT ESTABLISHMENTS
memorandums.excerpt: Judicial directive issued to clarify and reinforce the imperative for unobstructed facial identification within public and government establishments in Los Santos.
memorandums.author: The Honorable Kawatskie Delos Reyes, Chief Justice

memorandums.title: IMMEDIATE APPREHENSION OF HIGH-ALERT SUBJECTS FRANK BOMPENSIERO AND LUCIANO D'ANGELO
memorandums.excerpt: Urgent directive regarding the immediate apprehension of Mr. Frank Bompensiero and Mr. Luciano D'Angelo - high alert subjects involved in attempted murder of a Law Enforcement Officer.
memorandums.author: Department of Justice (DOJ)
